content:
During the day, the occupiers made 458 beats on ten settlements of Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisinformsHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

According to him, the military personnel of the Russian Federation carried out an aviation blow to the robot, 7 RSZV-images of small Tokmachka and Roboty, 94 UAV attacked Gulyaypole, Novodanylivka, Novoandriivka, Novodarivka, Malinivka, Malinivka, Malinivka, Malinivka, Robne, Small Tokmachka, Railway and Magney.

"356 Artudari was inflicted on the territory of Guliaypol, Robovy, Malynivka, Little Tokmachka, Novodanylivka, Levadny, Novoandriivka and Novodarivka," - said the head of Ova.

In addition, there were 3 reports of destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure. Fortunately, civilians were not injured.

As reported by the Armyinform, the enemy continuesattack the civilian populationKherson region: There is a wounded.

We will remind, on the Great Pisarivkapulled off23 Aircraft per day.
title: Last day, the aggressor made almost 500 beats in Zaporozhye, there is a destruction
description: The head of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov informs about it. According to him, ...
author: Army Inform
